org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find

Class MockFileSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configured
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FileSystem
        • org.apache.hadoop.fs.FilterFileSystem
          • org.apache.hadoop.fs.shell.find.MockFileSystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Configurable

     class MockFileSystem
extends FilterFileSystem
    A mock FileSystem for use with the Find unit tests. Usage: FileSystem mockFs = MockFileSystem.setup(); Methods in the mockFs can then be mocked out by the test script. The Configuration can be accessed by mockFs.getConf(); The following methods are fixed within the class: - FileSystem.initialize(URI,Configuration) blank stub - FileSystem.makeQualified(Path) returns the passed in Path - FileSystem.getWorkingDirectory() returns new Path("/") - FileSystem.resolvePath(Path) returns the passed in Path

      • globStatus

        public FileStatus[] globStatus(Path pathPattern)
                        throws IOException
        Description copied from class: FileSystem

        Return all the files that match filePattern and are not checksum files. Results are sorted by their names.

        A filename pattern is composed of regular characters and special pattern matching characters, which are:

        ?
        Matches any single character.

        *
        Matches zero or more characters.

        [abc]
        Matches a single character from character set {a,b,c}.

        [a-b]
        Matches a single character from the character range {a...b}. Note that character a must be lexicographically less than or equal to character b.

        [^a]
        Matches a single character that is not from character set or range {a}. Note that the ^ character must occur immediately to the right of the opening bracket.

        \c
        Removes (escapes) any special meaning of character c.

        {ab,cd}
        Matches a string from the string set {ab, cd}

        {ab,c{de,fh}}
        Matches a string from the string set {ab, cde, cfh}
        Overrides:
        globStatus in class FileSystem
        Parameters:
        pathPattern - a regular expression specifying a pth pattern
        Returns:
        an array of paths that match the path pattern
        Throws:
        IOException
